root: ^With all objectives complete, you should make your way towards an extraction point.
^You can always tell extraction points apart by their green outline. Currently, they are all located on your right.
^Once a character reaches an extraction point with all objectives complete, you can press the Exit button to secure their escape.
^However, Frankie probably doesn’t have the <color="yellow">MP</color> to reach them right now.
^To fully restore the crew’s MP, you can always end your turn by pressing the End Turn button.
^In the future, keep in mind that you'll need the whole crew to reach an extraction point for a successful mission. Leave no one behind.
